name: Army Fighter Jet Attack
description:
You are playing as an airborne fighter pilot of fighting aircraft simulator game. All you need is take down the enemy jet fighter planes, which are trying to attack heli carrier / aircraft carrier. As an expert airborne fighter pilot, now it’s your duty to take down these opponents and keep your heli carrier safe. Implement your special training skills to keep your air superiority, indulge in the air combat while flying a military fighter jet. Flip through the air while performing the extreme shooting action. Hunt down each and every jet fighter plane of enemy and do not miss a single shot.

FEATURES:
Realistic aircrafts
Challenging AI opponents aircraft.
Realistic flying physics available on mobile!
Real sounds of roaring fighter aircrafts.
Amazing and Marvelous real 3D mountains and sea environment
